Package businessLogic

Class BlFacadeImplementation

java.lang.Object
businessLogic.BlFacadeImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlFacade
public class BlFacadeImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements BlFacade
Implements the business logic as a web service.

      Description copied from interface: BlFacade
      This method creates a question for an event, with a question text and the minimum bet
      Specified by:
      createQuestion in interface BlFacade
      Parameters:
      event - to which question is added
      question - text of the question
      betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
      Returns:
      the created question, or null, or an exception
      Throws:
      EventFinished - if current data is after data of the event
      QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event

    • register

      public void register​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String confirmPassword, int year, int month, int day) throws InvalidDateException, UnderageRegistrationException, IncorrectPSWConfirmException, PswTooShortException, NoMatchingPatternException, UsernameAlreadyInDBException
      Description copied from interface: BlFacade
      Registers a standard permit user into the data base (persistance).
      Specified by:
      register in interface BlFacade
      Parameters:
      username - The identification string of the user.
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      address - The current billing address of the user.
      email - The contact vinculated email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      confirmPassword - Additional password for checking original passwords corretness.
      year - The birth year of the user.
      month - The month of the birth of the user.
      day - The birth day of the user.
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - Thrown when the given year, month and year's format is invalid.
      UnderageRegistrationException - Thrown when the user is underage; has less than 18 years.
      IncorrectPSWConfirmException - Thrown when the password and the checking confirmPassword do not match.
      PswTooShortException - Thrown when the potential password is shorter than the required minimum (MINIMUM_PSW_LENGHT).
      NoMatchingPatternException - Thrown when the email does not match the standard format.
      UsernameAlreadyInDBException - Thrown when the chosen username is already in the DB.

    • login

      public User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws UserNotFoundException, InvalidPasswordException
      Description copied from interface: BlFacade
      Returns the user if successfully logged, otherwise an exception is raised.
      Specified by:
      login in interface BlFacade
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user.
      password - Password of the user.
      Returns:
      True if the user has succesfully logged.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user is not registered in the data base.
      InvalidPasswordException - If the password is not correct.
